testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could use register functionality to open new accounts
testcase.name: user could register with valid fristname and lastname and email and password and confirmPassword
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user lregister with valid fristname and lastname and email and password and confirmPassword.passed And user press on register button...........................................passed Then user register to the system successfully...............................passed And user logout to login page...............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to open their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid email and password...............................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_RestPassword | users could use Rest password functionality
testcase.name: users could use Rest password with vaild email
testcase.system-out: Given user go to Rest page..................................................passed When user rest with valid email.............................................passed And user press on Recover button............................................passed Then user rest password successfully........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page before sreach...................................passed When user login before search with valid email and password................passed Then user login to the system successfully before search....................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search for product using fullname
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on search field...........................................passed When user search with name of product.......................................passed Then user could find relative results.......................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_switch_between_currencies | Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: user could switch between currencies
testcase.system-out: Given user in home page.....................................................passed When user detierment to Euro................................................passed Then user switch between currencies US-Euro successfully....................passed

testcase.classname: F06_select_different_Categories | Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.name: user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given Logged user in home page..............................................passed When user detierment to Categories and Hover to sub_Categories..............passed Then Click on sub categories successfully...................................passed

testcase.classname: F07_filter_with_colorfeature | Logged user could filter with color
testcase.name: user could filter with color
testcase.system-out: Given Logged user in home page to Filter....................................passed When user determined to Categories like Apparel > Shoes.....................passed And Filter with blue color..................................................passed Then filtertion successfully................................................passed

testcase.classname: F09_AddShoppingcart | Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart.............passed When user add Frist products to Shopping cart...............................passed And assert shopping cart have Frist product.................................passed Then user add Scoend products to Shopping cart..............................passed And assert shopping cart have Scoend product................................passed

testcase.classname: F10_AddWishlistcart | Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given Logged user could add different products to Wishlist cart.............passed When user add Frist products to Wishlist cart...............................passed And user add Scoend products to Wishlist cart...............................passed Then assert Wishlist cart have two product..................................passed

testcase.classname: F11_Addtocomparecart | Logged user could add different products to compare list
testcase.name: could add different products to compare list
